DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate potential Tazarotene Foam induce phototoxic reaction expose UV VIS light skin healthy volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Potential Tazarotene Foam Cause Reaction When Applied Skin Exposed Light Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 1 , single center , evaluator-blinded , randomize , vehicle control study evaluate potential Tazarotene Foam 0.1 % induce phototoxic reaction healthy adult volunteer . Approximately 40 healthy , male female , volunteer subject age 18 65 year enrol . Each subject expose three ( 3 ) set three ( 3 ) patch contain Tazarotene Foam , Vehicle Foam Blank Patch ( study product ) . Each patch set apply randomized site subject 's back . Patch set remove evaluated 24 hour exposure . The exposed patch site irradiate ( exposed light ) evaluate 1 hour post irradiation 24 , 48 , 72 hour .
